resources.string:
Last Updated: (02.11.2021) Please read the following Terms and Conditions (“Terms”, “Terms and Conditions”) carefully before using the “Analyse Your Own Daily Herd Data AYODH” mobile application (herein termed as “Services” operated and designed by the “App developers” (Dr. CS Mukhopadhyay, Dr. Kirtypal Singh and Dr. JPS Gill) of Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Ludhiana Punjab, India (herein termed as “us”, “we” or “our”). While using the afore-stated application, you are liable to full access to and use of our services that is conditioned on your acceptance and compliance of herein stated Terms. Please note that our terms will apply to all visitors, users who access or use the services provided by the Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University, Ludhiana. Punjab India (herein termed as “service provider” or “service provider facility”). Further, as the case may be if you are personally interested in any subscription services(s) from our service provided then, it will require access to your personal data, location and contact details (such as mobile number and email Id) which will be directly linked to our service facility. Any infringement of privacy or sharing your aforesaid personal details, location and contact details and farm details to third party software, malware on your fault or from your electronic device, our service facility won’t be entitled to any recovery or recoveries or loss or damage (any personal or financial) incurred due to the same. Content Our service facility for this version of the AYODH App is full fledge free for all farmers across India and we are not charging any amount in any mode either (“cash”, ”credit”, ”debit”, ”cheque” or “payment wallet”) to be made in favour of our service facility provider. Our service(s) allow(s) you to store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material (therein termed as “Content”) for your mobile storage purpose only. End-user (you) will be solely responsible for any data loss for service(s) in the future because the service provider owes no responsibility for storing/archiving the user’s data in any front or back-end server. Hence, the service provider is not possible in any case to provide you back-up on behalf of our service provider facility. The end-user (YOU) is sincerely requested and advised to make the back up of all data from time to time. Besides our service(s) may provide you an opportunity to link your mobile app to other third-party web-sites or services that are not owned, controlled, manged by our service provider. Any loss incurred due to any malware attack from third party website or third party application developers may cause loss of your personal data or stored service(s). data, for which you are solely responsible, as an advice we ensure you that our service facility will not endorse any third party application or software or web link or information (herein termed as “third party resources”) which could be potentially harmful for your device and personal data, therefore you are be advised before using or clicking or visiting any third party resource to check with their we credentials, certificates and related information. Our service provider facility has no control and assumes no responsibility for the content published, incidental privacy infringement into or the practices, services of any third party resource or resources. Changes The application developers (Dr. CS Mukhopadhyay, Dr Kirtypal Singh and Dr JPS Gill) firmly reserves all rights to modify or update or change this application termed here as “services” supported by “service provider facility” from time to time. Under no circumstance, any organization or agency can modify or update or change any content or terms or conditions of this application. Any modification or revision or change or update in service or service provider facility or application will cause a change or modification in these Terms and Conditions accordingly, in the future. Any user (you or else other) who punch his personal information as requested by this application or service provider facility will have to agree to the changes as applicable in future after revision or change or updating of this mobile application. Service provider facility ensures you that any change or modification or update or alteration in end user policy or mobile application or terms and conditions will be notified duly to the end user in form of notification while using this application. Contact Us If you have any question, objection about these terms and conditions, please feel free to contact us at the following mailboxes: (csmbioinfo@gmail.com, kirtysangha@gmail.com).
 I agree with each tern and condition for accessing the facility usage if this mobile application on my personal device.  I decline to agree with the aforesaid terms and conditions, I don’t want to use the services provided by this mobile application on my personal device.
